means: 预言，预测，预示( predict的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Predicting voting trends from economic forecasts is a dodgy business.
sentence.Network_cn: 根据对经济的预测来预言选举的走势不大可靠。

sentence.Network_en: The latest opinion polls are predicting a very close contest.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近的民意测验预测竞争将会非常激烈。

sentence.Network_en: The Treasury has long been predicting an upturn in consumer spending.
sentence.Network_cn: 财政部早就预测消费者支出会出现上扬。

PerfectNetExp.abs: produce monthly , quarterly and' end of mine' reconciliations and investigate findings to ensure continuous improvement in predicting feed tonnage and grades to the mill .拟定月、季、及整个矿山寿命期内的配矿计划，调查相关资料信息以改进对选厂供矿的品位和数量的预测数据。
research progress of predicting system of grasshoppers in gansu province ., 甘肃省草地蝗虫测报系统研究现状.

list.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... precocious 早熟的 predict 预言,预报 predisposition 倾向,癖性.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... jurisdiction n 司法权 predict v 预言；预告 indict v 起诉，控诉.
除了可预测性（predictability）之外，我觉得可行性（feasibility）对我来说，比较重要啦。ㄟ？
预测（prediction）和预言(prophecy) 是有分别的。在英语中这两个词很容易就被混淆。
八年级下册英语单词_百度百科 ... 39 predict v. 预知,预言,预报 41 prediction n. 预言,预报 43 come true 实现,达到.

entry.def: If you predict an event, you say that it will happen.

example.ex: The latest opinion polls are predicting a very close contest...
example.tran: 最近的民意测验预测竞争将会非常激烈。

example.ex: He predicted that my hair would grow back 'in no time'...
example.tran: 他预言我的头发“一眨眼”就会长回来。

auth_sentence.content: Predicting the future is usually a sucker's bet.
auth_sentence.res_content: Predicting the future is usually a sucker's bet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Predicting the future is usually a sucker's bet.

auth_sentence.content: Thus special relativity is predicting nonsense in this respect.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thus special relativity is predicting nonsense in this respect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thus special relativity is predicting nonsense in this respect.

auth_sentence.content: There's no predicting when the menopause will occur.
auth_sentence.res_content: There's no predicting when the menopause will occur.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's no predicting when the menopause will occur.

Sentence.sentence: By reflecting on Americans' previous failures in predicting earthquakes.
